mapper.select: select id, film_id, cinema_id, room_id, start_time, end_time, total_num, sel_num, price from t_record where id = #{id}
select id, film_id, cinema_id, room_id, start_time, end_time, total_num, sel_num, price from t_record limit #{pageable.offset}, #{pageable.pageSize}
mapper.insert: insert into t_record(film_id, cinema_id, room_id, start_time, end_time, total_num, sel_num, price) values (#{filmId}, #{cinemaId}, #{roomId}, #{startTime}, #{endTime}, #{totalNum}, #{selNum}, #{price})

insert into t_record(film_id, cinema_id, room_id, start_time, end_time, total_num, sel_num, price) values
(#{entity.filmId}, #{entity.cinemaId}, #{entity.roomId}, #{entity.startTime}, #{entity.endTime}, #{entity.totalNum}, #{entity.selNum}, #{entity.price})

insert into t_record(film_id, cinema_id, room_id, start_time, end_time, total_num, sel_num, price) values
(#{entity.filmId}, #{entity.cinemaId}, #{entity.roomId}, #{entity.startTime}, #{entity.endTime}, #{entity.totalNum}, #{entity.selNum}, #{entity.price})
on duplicate key update film_id = values(film_id), cinema_id = values(cinema_id), room_id = values(room_id), start_time = values(start_time), end_time = values(end_time), total_num = values(total_num), sel_num = values(sel_num), price = values(price)
mapper.update:
update t_record
film_id = #{filmId},
cinema_id = #{cinemaId},
room_id = #{roomId},
start_time = #{startTime},
end_time = #{endTime},
total_num = #{totalNum},
sel_num = #{selNum},
price = #{price},
where id = #{id}
